articles.author: Elon Musk
articles.description:
Re @RationalEtienne @arctechinc I do not doubt that. Criticism, public or private, is welcome after we go to wide beta. 
Early beta has many known issues. The reason we release it to a limited number of cars is to discover unknown issues.
articles.title: Re @RationalEtienne @arctechinc I do not doubt that. Criticism, public or private, is welcome after we go to wide beta. Early beta has many known issu...

articles.author: Elon Musk
articles.description:
Re @RationalEtienne @arctechinc No. Let me make something clear: James contacted me directly to be included in *early* beta, which is only ~1000 cars, mostly employees. 
Early beta explicitly has issues or it would be rolled out widely, so publicly criticizing something he had asked for is wrong.
articles.title: Re @RationalEtienne @arctechinc No. Let me make something clear: James contacted me directly to be included in *early* beta, which is only ~1000 cars,...
